entries.title: Organization Details in Virima
entries.chunk: Organization Details in Virima allow administrators to configure organizational structure including departments, locations, cost centers, designations, operational hours, and holidays. Access through Admin module.

entries.title: Accessing Virima CMDB
entries.chunk: To access CMDB in Virima, navigate to the main menu and select the CMDB module. Users need appropriate permissions (CMDB_READ or higher) to view configuration items. The CMDB provides comprehensive asset and configuration management.

entries.title: Virima ITSM Overview
entries.chunk: Virima ITSM provides comprehensive incident, problem, change, and service request management. It includes ticketing system, workflow automation, SLA management, and seamless integration with CMDB for context-aware service management.

entries.title: Virima Discovery Overview
entries.chunk: Virima Discovery automatically scans and discovers IT infrastructure, applications, and cloud resources. Uses both agentless and agent-based methods to identify assets, map dependencies, and populate CMDB with accurate configuration data.

entries.title: Virima Admin Functions
entries.chunk: Virima Admin Functions provide comprehensive administrative capabilities including system configuration, user management, discovery configuration, SACM settings, integrations, and organizational setup. Available in both new and legacy UI versions.

entries.title: Cost Centers in Virima
entries.chunk: Cost Centers in Virima track expenses and allocate costs across departments. Configure through Admin > Organization Details > Cost Center. Each cost center has unique code, name, and budget allocation for financial tracking.

entries.title: Departments Management in Virima
entries.chunk: Departments in Virima are managed through Admin > Organization Details > Departments. Create, edit, delete departments, assign members, and establish hierarchical relationships. Foundation for organizational structure.

metadata.usage: For AI training, semantic search, and LLM context
